Title: WHALES similarity search on 600k molecules from Q-Mug
Description: Search Q-Mug based on WHALES descriptors. Q-Mug is a subset of 600k bioactive molecules from ChEMBL. Three conformers are given for each molecule. WhALES is a simple descriptor useful for scaffold hopping.
Interpretation: The top 100 most similar molecules are returned, based on WHALES descriptors. 3D conformer generation is done internally.
